A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Quite a dull experience - too many characters basically doing nothing. Perhaps it would have been better to stop after the first six films - the first three was a great story\, in the next three it was interesting to know the past of the characters\, but so far two of the final three films seems mostly like history repeating itself with better graphics - quite a shame when considering the importance of this old series of films.
